string-array.name: mainCourseDesc
string-array.item: A steakhouse classic. Char-grilled 12 oz. ribeye with savoury herb butter melted on top. Served with crispy thin cut fries tossed in Parmesan cheese and garlic butter, a Parmesan-crusted broiled tomato half and horseradish sauce.
Our tender, juicy, crispy chicken tenders are drizzled with honey and served with honey mustard dressing and crispy seasoned fries.
Cajun-spiced chicken breasts topped with Cajun cream sauce served over savoury rice. Served with New Orleans corn cobs and a side of Cajun cream sauce.

string-array.name: dessertDesc
string-array.item: A warm brownie covered in chocolate fudge sauce, vanilla ice cream, caramel sauce and chopped nuts.
Chocolate ganache filling in a graham cracker crust, topped with toasted marshmallows.
Two Oreo® cookies sandwiched with vanilla ice cream and topped with hot fudge sauce.

string-array.name: drinkDesc
string-array.item: Gin, simple and ginger syrups, lime juice, tonic water, Chambord and blueberries.
Raspberries, guava syrup, fresh lemon and lime juices, agave nectar and black tea.
Jack Daniel’s Tennessee Whiskey, Peach Schnapps, Red Sangria syrup, mint leaves, blackberries and lemon-lime soda.
